channel.title: Wii Simulator!
channel.description:
[center][size=25pt]Wii Simulator V2 By Wonderguy6 [/size] [/center] Ive Created one. Well its not anSimunlator. It Dose not play WII Games. Though it dose let you use some wii apps. Like. [*]Mii Creation. [*]Wii WebBrowser. (Tabbed browsing and everything) [*]Wii Search Engine [*]Wii IRC [*]Wii Home (Real look-alike interface) [*]Wii Radio1 [*]Wii Radio2 [*]Wii Maps [*]Wii Tube (youtube for the WII) [*]Wii Paint Program [*]Wii Flicker Browser (Really really cool browser) AND A LOT MORE! [o]Screenshots! [center][img]http://www.imageshack.us/img/imageshack.png[/img] [img]http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/1040/screenshot1pn6.png[/img] [img]http://img223.imageshack.us/img223/5032/screenshot2lb0.png[/img][/center] Im looking for more and ill make a V3. So here.
[center][size=15pt][url=http://rapidshare.com/files/15920315/WiiSimunilator.rar.html]Download [/url][/size] Mirror 1: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=36BOAVKS
Mirror 2: http://rapidshare.com/files/15920315/WiiSimunilator.rar.html
Mirror 3: http://www.uploading.com/files/XYVBTW04/WiiSimunilator.rar.html[/center] [hr] This is VERY VERY Cool. and really fun. Didn't take me that long.... :P So have fun. ;) Tell your friends you have Wii on your pc except it cant play disk games ;)

item.title: Wii Simulator!
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

[quote=“nix, post:25, topic:54021”][quote author=wonderguy6 link=topic=76232.msg886410#msg886410 date=1171175949]
http://rapidshare.com/files/15920315/WiiSimunilator.rar.html

The Version that works

http://www.wiili.org/index.php/Wii_os

http://www.zshare.net/download/wii_os_alpha_v1-1-zip.html

Bullshit. you need a sensor bar for the wiimote. all i gotta say is bullshit.
[/quote]

lawl as u seem to know little as the wii remote is a blue tooth device with very little effort people were able to connect thier controller to thier pc.

then people started to make scripts using glovePIE etc to make things suck as wiitar an wiidrums on the pc. all this does it use the wii as a mouse which is not only possible but basic to what people have done with it. the emulator uses home made clones of several wii apps and runs virtual console games in their own modified emulators not the wii vc emulator.

this is not bs this is real. research b4 u flame.[/quote]
w/e but you would get a better result using your mouse. and i didnt flame you. i flamed the program. Ive tryed this with my wiimote. it sucks. its very hard!

Read full topic
